name: Tangram Unlimited
description:
The tangram is a classic dissection puzzle originated in China. It consists of seven flat shapes, called tans. The objective of the puzzle is to form a specific shape using all seven pieces, which may not overlap.

The game includes 150 puzzles. 150 interesting shapes all can be formed by the seven pieces of Tangram. You will be amazed by the magic of the Tangram.
